column4: shahriyaguliyev and if you really have 600 GB of very important data, i wonder what that could be.
shahriyaguliyev a usb stick about 8 GB, dropbox 2 GB
shahriyaguliyev Yes there is no other way if your movies are so important.
But when I talk about very important data I mean scans of diplomas, text files with passwords etc. That usually fits onto a free dropbox directory.
shahriyaguliyev it depends on in which part of the world you live.
There is, with no password set, so you cant login and cant hack that non-set password.
